Subroutine vom_tissue_water_et

1251 : 
1252 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
1253 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
1254 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
1255 : !*-----transpiration, gstom and tissue water ---------------------------
1256 : 
1257 :       subroutine vom_tissue_water_et (finish, netass)
1258 :       use vegwatmod
1259 :       use vegmod
1260 :       implicit none
1261 : 
1262 :       INTEGER, INTENT(inout) :: finish
1263 :       REAL*8,  INTENT(inout) :: netass
1264 : 
1265 : !     * makes sure that tissue water does not get below 0.9mqx
1266 :       if (mq_ .le. 0.9d0 * mqx_) then
1267 :         if (nlayers_ .ge. 1) then
1268 :           if (etm__ .gt. 0.9d0 * SUM(ruptkvec(:))) then
1269 :             if (SUM(ruptkvec(:)) .ge. 0.d0) then
1270 :               etm__ = SUM(ruptkvec(:))
1271 :               transp_ = etm__ * 55555.555555555555d0  ! (Out[249]) mol/s=m/s*10^6 g/m/(18g/mol)
1272 :               gstom__ = transp_ / (a__ * vd__)
1273 :             else
1274 :               write(*,'(a20,i2,a1,i2,a1,i4)') 'vegetation dies on: ',  &
1275 :      &          day(d___), '/', month(d___), '/', year(d___)
1276 :               netass = 0.d0
1277 : !             * if tissues water depleted, but still loosing water -> death
1278 :               finish = 1
1279 :               return
1280 :             endif
1281 :             call vom_mqss(mqss_)
1282 :             mqssmin = MIN(mqssmin, mqss_)
1283 :           endif
1284 :         else
1285 :           etm__   = 0.d0
1286 :           transp_ = 0.d0
1287 :           gstom__ = 0.d0
1288 :         endif
1289 :       endif
1290 :       if (nlayers_ .ge. 0) then
1291 : !       * (3.35), 1.e6 to convert from m (=1000kg/m2) to g/m2; (Out[250])
1292 :         dmq = (SUM(ruptkvec(:)) - etm__) * 1.d6
1293 :       else
1294 :         dmq = -etm__ * 1.d6
1295 :       endif
1296 : 
1297 :       return
1298 :       end subroutine vom_tissue_water_et
